name: QrEasy
summary: One-line QR generation helpers with sane defaults.

examples.title: EXAMPLE 1

members.name: Encode
members.summary: Encodes a payload into a CodeGlyphX.QrCode with defaults.
members.signature: static QrCode Encode(string payload, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: EncodeAuto
members.summary: Detects a payload type and encodes it into a CodeGlyphX.QrCode.
members.signature: static QrCode EncodeAuto(string payload, QrPayloadDetectOptions detectOptions, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: Encode
members.summary: Encodes a payload with embedded defaults.
members.signature: static QrCode Encode(QrPayloadData payload, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: EvaluateSafety
members.summary: Evaluates QR art safety for a payload and options.
members.signature: static QrArtSafetyReport EvaluateSafety(string payload, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: EvaluateSafety
members.summary: Evaluates QR art safety for a payload with embedded defaults.
members.signature: static QrArtSafetyReport EvaluateSafety(QrPayloadData payload, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: RenderPng
members.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG.
members.signature: static byte[] RenderPng(string payload, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: RenderPngAuto
members.summary: Detects a payload type and renders a QR code as PNG.
members.signature: static byte[] RenderPngAuto(string payload, QrPayloadDetectOptions detectOptions, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: RenderPngToStream
members.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG to a stream.
members.signature: static void RenderPngToStream(string payload, Stream stream, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: RenderPngToFile
members.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG and writes it to a file.
members.signature: static string RenderPngToFile(string payload, string path, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: RenderPngToFile
members.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG and writes it to a file for a payload with embedded defaults.
members.signature: static string RenderPngToFile(QrPayloadData payload, string path, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: RenderPng
members.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG for a payload with embedded defaults.
members.signature: static byte[] RenderPng(QrPayloadData payload, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: RenderPngToStream
members.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG to a stream for a payload with embedded defaults.
members.signature: static void RenderPngToStream(QrPayloadData payload, Stream stream, QrEasyOptions options)
